treatment.description: Distal leaves short-subulate beyond an ovate or obovate base, 1–1.8 mm, leaf base strongly differentiated in shape; distal laminal cells short-rectangular. Sexual condition autoicous. Seta 0.3–0.7 mm. Capsule neck short, obovate. Spores pitted. Calyptra smooth.
treatment.habitat: Soil, sandy loam, commonly surrounding quartz pebbles;
treatment.elevation: usually low but occasionally moderate elevations;
